text: Margarita Ganeva (born 1959, Sofia) was the Bulgarian Ambassador to Slovakia., She presented her credentials to Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Slovak Republic Miroslav Lajčák on April 25, 2012. Ganeva graduated with a degree in economics from the Economic University in Prague. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:People from Sofia Category:Women ambassadors Category:Ambassadors of Bulgaria to Slovakia
title: Margarita Ganeva
